## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G05500](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G05500)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtPRPL1, MOP10, PRPL1</u>
- **Gene Name:** proline-rich protein-like 1
- **Description:**   Pollen Ole e 1 allergen and extensin family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
